html: As Special Counsel Mueller wrote: “The Russian government interfered in the 2016 presidential election in sweeping and systematic fashion.” We cannot allow this to happen again. This wasn’t merely a couple of Facebook ads: this was an attack on our democracy.
text: As Special Counsel Mueller wrote: “The Russian government interfered in the 2016 presidential election in sweeping and systematic fashion.” We cannot allow this to happen again. This wasn’t merely a couple of Facebook ads: this was an attack on our democracy.

html: Nearly 200 charges against 34 individuals and 3 companies, including 6 former Trump officials and 26 Russian nationals, is much more than “a couple Facebook ads.” Any effort to downplay Russia’s interference isn’t just wrong – it’s dangerous for our democracy.https://twitter.com/VeraMBergen/status/1120705162530762752 …
text: Nearly 200 charges against 34 individuals and 3 companies, including 6 former Trump officials and 26 Russian nationals, is much more than “a couple Facebook ads.” Any effort to downplay Russia’s interference isn’t just wrong – it’s dangerous for our democracy.https://twitter.com/VeraMBergen/status/1120705162530762752 …

html: It’s critical that we support policies that combat the serious threat of climate change and act to promote sustainable solutions that safeguard the environment. The impacts will continue to grow if we continue to do nothing.
text: It’s critical that we support policies that combat the serious threat of climate change and act to promote sustainable solutions that safeguard the environment. The impacts will continue to grow if we continue to do nothing.

html: In NH, the effects of climate change are already causing serious damage, as shown by rising sea levels on NH’s Seacoast, the loss of trees and moose in our forests, and the erosion of the tourist industry, which is the livelihood of hundreds of thousands of Granite Staters.
text: In NH, the effects of climate change are already causing serious damage, as shown by rising sea levels on NH’s Seacoast, the loss of trees and moose in our forests, and the erosion of the tourist industry, which is the livelihood of hundreds of thousands of Granite Staters.

html: While the President has worked to weaken clean air and water protections, Republicans in Congress have chosen to politicize any actions that would help reverse the effects of climate change.https://www.washingtonpost.com/opinions/2019/03/27/gops-answer-catastrophic-climate-change-trolling-libs/?utm_term=.2870c9a83a02 …

html: Kids who vape are more likely to smoke tobacco and develop lifelong nicotine addiction. I introduced the E-cigarette Youth Protection Act, which would require e-cigarette companies to help fund prevention efforts, including outreach to young people on the health risks of vaping.
text: Kids who vape are more likely to smoke tobacco and develop lifelong nicotine addiction. I introduced the E-cigarette Youth Protection Act, which would require e-cigarette companies to help fund prevention efforts, including outreach to young people on the health risks of vaping.

html: E-cigarette use is skyrocketing among young people. According to the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, 1 in 5 high school students used e-cigarettes last year, up from 1 in 100 in 2011.
text: E-cigarette use is skyrocketing among young people. According to the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, 1 in 5 high school students used e-cigarettes last year, up from 1 in 100 in 2011.

html: “…It is important for women to have the choice to make the decision that is right for her life, her baby’s life, her family’s life.”

html: “…We are people who are already facing death, either to ourselves or to our child and have to decide what is best in this situation. Each person is different, there is no one size fits all solution…”

html: We must always remember that abortions that are performed later in pregnancy are often done so as a result of severe fetal diagnoses and the serious risks that the pregnancy poses to the life of the woman.
text: We must always remember that abortions that are performed later in pregnancy are often done so as a result of severe fetal diagnoses and the serious risks that the pregnancy poses to the life of the woman.

html: The recent government shutdown took a terrible toll on many NH families and businesses, and must not be repeated. I appreciate that the President again committed to reducing the cost of prescription drugs and investing in our nation's infrastructure.
text: The recent government shutdown took a terrible toll on many NH families and businesses, and must not be repeated. I appreciate that the President again committed to reducing the cost of prescription drugs and investing in our nation's infrastructure.

html: However, I was disappointed that the President didn't deliver a commitment to refrain from once again shutting down the government, or outline a willingness to compromise as Congress seeks a bipartisan agreement to fund the government and provide additional border security.
text: However, I was disappointed that the President didn't deliver a commitment to refrain from once again shutting down the government, or outline a willingness to compromise as Congress seeks a bipartisan agreement to fund the government and provide additional border security.

html: The President is correct that bipartisanship and compromise can yield results for the American people, as it has for addressing the opioid epidemic, veterans’ health care, childhood cancer, criminal justice reform and many other critical issues.
text: The President is correct that bipartisanship and compromise can yield results for the American people, as it has for addressing the opioid epidemic, veterans’ health care, childhood cancer, criminal justice reform and many other critical issues.

html: I spoke with the Sec of the Army Mark Esper earlier today who informed me that Francis Byrne will receive the Purple Heart. Francis Byrne is an American hero and I’m so thrilled that he will finally receive his Purple Heart for his incredible sacrifice and service.

html: I’m asking for a common sense ban on retroactive collection and an implementation delay so that Congress has time to protect small businesses from this unfair and unnecessary red tape.

html: It’s unacceptable that local small businesses will be forced to collect sales tax as soon as January 1st for other states, when NH is a sales-tax free state. I’m urging Senate leadership to act now to protect small business.pic.twitter.com/leUwi4AkGg

html: Drug Monitoring Programs: These play a critical role in identifying & reducing substance misuse. By increasing data sharing among prescribers in Medicaid, we will improve oversight of opioid prescriptions being filled. Reducing the amount of opioids being prescribed is critical.
text: Drug Monitoring Programs: These play a critical role in identifying & reducing substance misuse. By increasing data sharing among prescribers in Medicaid, we will improve oversight of opioid prescriptions being filled. Reducing the amount of opioids being prescribed is critical.

html: Help for Moms & Babies: The legislation ensures pregnant women who receive inpatient treatment for substance use disorder will still have Medicaid coverage for the maternity care they need & can continue w/ their recovery.
text: Help for Moms & Babies: The legislation ensures pregnant women who receive inpatient treatment for substance use disorder will still have Medicaid coverage for the maternity care they need & can continue w/ their recovery.

html: Alternative Pain Medication: The bill provides support for the development of non-addictive alternatives to opioids & gives @NIH the flexibility it needs to research non-addictive pain therapies, which will help prevent substance misuse.

html: Medication-Assisted Treatment: This will help increase treatment options for those who need it most, and strengthens our overall response actions to stop the opioid epidemic in its tracks.
